Text:
Oh maaan!  you are the greatest.  over the years at times I check for HOT FUCKIN' TUNA on  TPB but generally am disappointed.  This is a treat.   
35 years ago I had all these on vinyl. Havent heard  Hoppkorv or Double Dose in over 30 years.
You can be sure I will help seed and have huge fuckin UNLIMITED  bandwith!
Long live  HOT FUCKIN' TUNA
My friend will go absolutely apesh*t over this, and so will I, too!  Thanks very much, especially for the quality!
